1.0.name: wordpress/isearch
1.0.description:
About ISearch ?

ISearch is a wordpress post and page search plugin which allows users to filter content as they type the search text. Users can view the prefered results like a site tour.

View ISearch Demo

http://www.innovativephp.com/search

What can you do with ISearch

  • Allow users to find the content very quickly.
  • View the pages you want like a site tour.
  • Increase blog page views and user experience using tour effect.
